Title: Frontend Developer - React
Description:
NPAW is the leading video intelligence company helping online streaming services grow. A global pioneer in its space, NPAW has over a decade of experience developing ground-breaking, scalable analytics solutions to optimize performance and user engagement, to build media experiences that maximize revenue.




Its Suite of analytics apps provides advanced visibility of platform performance, audience behavior, advertising and content efficiency, and app navigation in real-time to support data-driven decisions. NPAW serves more than 150 video services and processes, with over 100 billion plays per year worldwide. Established in 2008 by co-founders of the video streaming service Rakuten TV, NPAW has offices in Barcelona and New York with teams around the world. For more information, visit https://npaw.com.




Description




We are looking for a great Frontend developer proficient with JavaScript to work along with Quim, Jorge, Eloi and Cristian, our great frontend team. We are passionate about creating scalable and well-structured JavaScript applications, using the latest best practices for responsive and user-friendly design.




You will be responsible for building and extending the user interface for our application, adding new modules and features, as well as optimizing existing code.




Responsibilities




Provide website maintenance and enhancements
Develop functional and appealing UI based on usability
Maintain graphic standards and branding throughout the product’s interface
Create quality mockups and prototypes
Promote usability best practices
Maintain current solutions to continuously deliver value to customers
Work with big data, on a highly-dynamic and interesting UI for data visualization
Work on new features with React and Redux.
Work closely with QA engineers and product Managers, helping us moving towards continuous delivery.




Requirements




1–3 years of experience, preferably in a start-up environment.
Experience with UI development (JavaScript & React)
Able to work under pressure and adapt quickly to change of priorities.
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.
You are passionate about creating scalable, high-performance, well-structured and efficient code.
Good understanding of the best practices for cross-browser compatibility
Experience with processing large amounts of data
Experience working with complex logic
Good verbal and written communication skills in English. Spanish will be highly valued.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team




Tech Stack




React with Material UI
Redux
ECharts




Benefits
Competitive salary 💰
Permanent contract 📄
Flexible compensation plan 📊
Restaurant 🍽
Transport 🚊
Nursery 👶🏽
Health insurance 🩺
Hybrid remote-office work 🏡
Flexible work schedule ⏰
23 days of holidays per year 🌴
Birthday afternoon off 🎂
Career growth opportunities 🚀
Access to continuous training 💻
Language lessons 👩🏽‍🏫
Referral bonus 🤝
International & multicultural team (more than 20 nationalities!) 🌍
Fun environment: volunteering, company events, BBQs, pizza days, etc. 🎉
A great office based in Barcelona 🏢
Free lunch at the office 🥗🍕
Free drinks, fruit & snacks ☕️🍺 🍎 🍪
An amazing technological challenge 🧑🏽‍💻




Follow us on Linkedin and Twitter to see what we are up to, or have a look at Instagram to see what it's like to work at NPAW!




We celebrate the diversity, and we want our employees to reflect those differences. At NPAW, we’re committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or expression, or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Overview




About D+A at PepsiCo




PepsiCo is using the power of data to transform the way our world-famous portfolio of brands is sold every day. Our Data & Analytics organization influences every aspect of how we sell and move our products. In just a short period of time, they’ve built new capabilities that have defined the roadmap across all our brands. Members of our team solve complex problems facing our rapidly changing business and get to see their work come to life in the real world.




Data Science




Join our Data Science team where you will be part of a collaborative interdisciplinary team around data, where you will be responsible of building deployable statistical/machine learning models, starting from the discovery phase. You will work closely with process owners, product owners and final business users. This will provide you the correct visibility and understanding of criticality of your developments.




Your mission




Your role will be to be part of growing team based in Barcelona, to create and support global digital developments for PepsiCo. These developments will be focus on Consumer Analytics and Innovation but with the option in the future to collaborate into other fields such as revenue management, supply chain, manufacturing, logistics.




You will be part of a collaborative interdisciplinary team around data, where you will be responsible of building deployable statistical/machine learning models, starting from the discovery phase. You will work closely with process owners, product owners and final business users. This will provide you the correct visibility and understanding of criticality of your developments.




You will be an internal ambassador of the team’s culture around data and analytics. You will provide stewardship to colleagues in the areas that you are an specialist or you are specializing.




Responsibilities




Your day to day with us




Refine requirements into modelling problems.
Set KPIs and metrics to evaluate analytics solution given a particular use case.
Research state-of-the-art methodologies.
Create documentation for learnings and knowledge transfer.
Create reusable packages or libraries
Comfortable working with cloud environments (such as Databricks)
Comfortable working with CI / CD
Support large-scale experimentation and build data-driven models.
Familiar with visualizations tools (such as PowerBi) to easily demonstrate insights of the data&results.
Partner with data engineers to ensure data access for discovery and proper data is prepared for model consumption.
Partner with ML engineers working on industrialization.
Coordinate work activities with Business teams, other IT services and as required.
Drive the use of the Platform toolset and to also focus on 'the art of the possible' demonstrations to the business as needed.
Communicate with business stakeholders in the process of service design, training and knowledge transfer.
Influence product teams through data-based recommendations.




Qualifications




What you will need to succeed:




Fluent in git (version control, pre-commit tools), SQL, Python, PySpark syntaxis.
Experience writing tests (pytest) with Python.
3+ years’ experience in ETL and/or data wrangling techniques.
3+ years’ experience in Statistical/ML techniques to solve supervised (regression, classification) and unsupervised problems.
Experience working with Time Series Data.
Experience in developing business problem using Databricks.
Business storytelling and communicating data insights in business consumable format. Fluent in one Visualization tool (preferable PowerBi).
Strong communications and organizational skills with the ability to deal with ambiguity while juggling multiple priorities
Experience with Agile methodology for team work and analytics ‘product’ creation. Fluent in Azure Boards and Wiki.
Experience with distributed machine learning is a plus
Building Docker images are a plus.
Experiences with Deep Learning are a plus.
Experience with Azure cloud services is a plus.
Experience in Reinforcement Learning is a plus.
Experience in Simulation and Optimization problems in any space is a plus.
Experience with Bayesian methods is a plus.
Experience with Causal inference is a plus.
Experience with NLP is a plus.
Experience with working with FAIR data is a plus.
Experience with Responsible AI is a plus.




What makes us different?




Hybrid work model & collaborative office experience to enable innovation
Entrepreneurial environment in leading international company
Professional growth possibilities & learning opportunities
Variety of benefits to support your physical, emotional and financial wellbeing
Volunteering opportunities to help external communities
Diverse team from over 25 countries
Have a stake in D&I strategy and Bring your whole self to work




About PepsiCo




We believe that culture should be at the cornerstone of everything we do at PepsiCo. We operate with start-up mindset – agile, innovative and not afraid of failure. We want our team to come to work every day excited to explore new ways bring enjoyment, refreshment and fun to the world.




PepsiCo Positive (pep+) is the future of our organization – a strategic end-to-end transformation, with sustainability at the center of how we will create growth and value by operating within planetary boundaries and inspiring positive change for the planet and people. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PO5CdBmWjUY




So, if you’re ready to be a part of a playground for those who think big, we’d love to chat.




 We encourage the diversity of applicants across gender, age, ethnicity, nationality, sexual orientation, social background, religion or belief and disability




Show more Show less
HTML:
Overview


About D+A at PepsiCo


PepsiCo is using the power of data to transform the way our world-famous portfolio of brands is sold every day. Our Data & Analytics organization influences every aspect of how we sell and move our products. In just a short period of time, they’ve built new capabilities that have defined the roadmap across all our brands. Members of our team solve complex problems facing our rapidly changing business and get to see their work come to life in the real world.


Data Science


Join our Data Science team where you will be part of a collaborative interdisciplinary team around data, where you will be responsible of building deployable statistical/machine learning models, starting from the discovery phase. You will work closely with process owners, product owners and final business users. This will provide you the correct visibility and understanding of criticality of your developments.


Your mission


Your role will be to be part of growing team based in Barcelona, to create and support global digital developments for PepsiCo. These developments will be focus on Consumer Analytics and Innovation but with the option in the future to collaborate into other fields such as revenue management, supply chain, manufacturing, logistics.


You will be part of a collaborative interdisciplinary team around data, where you will be responsible of building deployable statistical/machine learning models, starting from the discovery phase. You will work closely with process owners, product owners and final business users. This will provide you the correct visibility and understanding of criticality of your developments.


You will be an internal ambassador of the team’s culture around data and analytics. You will provide stewardship to colleagues in the areas that you are an specialist or you are specializing.


Responsibilities


Your day to day with us


  • Refine requirements into modelling problems.
  • Set KPIs and metrics to evaluate analytics solution given a particular use case.
  • Research state-of-the-art methodologies.
  • Create documentation for learnings and knowledge transfer.
  • Create reusable packages or libraries
  • Comfortable working with cloud environments (such as Databricks)
  • Comfortable working with CI / CD
  • Support large-scale experimentation and build data-driven models.
  • Familiar with visualizations tools (such as PowerBi) to easily demonstrate insights of the data&results.
  • Partner with data engineers to ensure data access for discovery and proper data is prepared for model consumption.
  • Partner with ML engineers working on industrialization.
  • Coordinate work activities with Business teams, other IT services and as required.
  • Drive the use of the Platform toolset and to also focus on 'the art of the possible' demonstrations to the business as needed.
  • Communicate with business stakeholders in the process of service design, training and knowledge transfer.
  • Influence product teams through data-based recommendations.


Qualifications


What you will need to succeed:


  • Fluent in git (version control, pre-commit tools), SQL, Python, PySpark syntaxis.
  • Experience writing tests (pytest) with Python.
  • 3+ years’ experience in ETL and/or data wrangling techniques.
  • 3+ years’ experience in Statistical/ML techniques to solve supervised (regression, classification) and unsupervised problems.
  • Experience working with Time Series Data.
  • Experience in developing business problem using Databricks.
  • Business storytelling and communicating data insights in business consumable format. Fluent in one Visualization tool (preferable PowerBi).
  • Strong communications and organizational skills with the ability to deal with ambiguity while juggling multiple priorities
  • Experience with Agile methodology for team work and analytics ‘product’ creation. Fluent in Azure Boards and Wiki.
  • Experience with distributed machine learning is a plus
  • Building Docker images are a plus.
  • Experiences with Deep Learning are a plus.
  • Experience with Azure cloud services is a plus.
  • Experience in Reinforcement Learning is a plus.
  • Experience in Simulation and Optimization problems in any space is a plus.
  • Experience with Bayesian methods is a plus.
  • Experience with Causal inference is a plus.
  • Experience with NLP is a plus.
  • Experience with working with FAIR data is a plus.
  • Experience with Responsible AI is a plus.


What makes us different?


  • Hybrid work model & collaborative office experience to enable innovation
  • Entrepreneurial environment in leading international company
  • Professional growth possibilities & learning opportunities
  • Variety of benefits to support your physical, emotional and financial wellbeing
  • Volunteering opportunities to help external communities
  • Diverse team from over 25 countries
  • Have a stake in D&I strategy and Bring your whole self to work


About PepsiCo


We believe that culture should be at the cornerstone of everything we do at PepsiCo. We operate with start-up mindset – agile, innovative and not afraid of failure. We want our team to come to work every day excited to explore new ways bring enjoyment, refreshment and fun to the world.


PepsiCo Positive (pep+) is the future of our organization – a strategic end-to-end transformation, with sustainability at the center of how we will create growth and value by operating within planetary boundaries and inspiring positive change for the planet and people. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PO5CdBmWjUY


So, if you’re ready to be a part of a playground for those who think big, we’d love to chat.


  •  We encourage the diversity of applicants across gender, age, ethnicity, nationality, sexual orientation, social background, religion or belief and disability

Title: Software Engineer (Hybrid Remote)
Description:
NPAW is the leading video intelligence company helping online streaming services grow. A global pioneer in its space, NPAW has over a decade of experience developing ground-breaking, scalable analytics solutions to optimize performance and user engagement, to build media experiences that maximize revenue.

Its Suite of analytics apps provides advanced visibility of platform performance, audience behavior, advertising and content efficiency, and app navigation in real-time to support data-driven decisions. NPAW serves more than 150 video services and processes, with over 100 billion plays per year worldwide. Established in 2008 by co-founders of the video streaming service Rakuten TV, NPAW has offices in Barcelona and New York with teams around the world. For more information, visit https://npaw.com.

Responsibilities
Building tools and software developed in Java that enables the creation and evolution of different products which allow our clients to understand users' behavior.
Optimization of existing services
Working along with our different departments to develop groundbreaking technology:
Collaborating with the Product Team to create and develop new metrics to make valuable contributions to our Analytics Software.
Cooperating with the UI department to offer a great data visualization experience.
Collaborating with the Customer Engineering and Operations teams to plan the different custom development projects cycles and deliverables.
Crafting new functionalities able to process and analyze high volumes of data.

Requirements

Experience in projects as a back-end developer and using Java.
Experience working with local and distributed cache libraries to improve performance.
Experience ensuring APIs are always reachable, scalable, and capable of processing permanent high volumes of data.
Experience in service optimization.
Knowledge of Git version control system, and automation tools such as Jenkins or TeamCity.
Passionate about programming, always looking for solutions to solve engineering problems.
Not afraid of learning new things such as other programming languages, different technologies.
Dedicated and used to tight deadlines.
Can do attitude, commitment and pride in what you do.

Benefits
Competitive salary 💰
Permanent contract 📄
Flexible compensation plan 📊
Restaurant 🍽
Transport 🚊
Nursery 👶🏽
Health insurance 🩺
Hybrid remote-office work 🏡
Flexible work schedule ⏰
23 days of holidays per year 🌴
Birthday afternoon off 🎂
Career growth opportunities 🚀
Access to continuous training 💻
Language lessons 👩🏽‍🏫
Referral bonus 🤝
International & multicultural team (more than 20 nationalities!) 🌍
Fun environment: volunteering, company events, BBQs, pizza days, etc. 🎉
A great office based in Barcelona 🏢
Free lunch at the office 🥗🍕
Free drinks, fruit & snacks ☕️🍺 🍎 🍪
An amazing technological challenge 🧑🏽‍💻

Follow us on Linkedin and Twitter to see what we are up to, or have a look at Instagram to see what it's like to work at NPAW!

We celebrate the diversity, and we want our employees to reflect those differences. At NPAW, we’re committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or expression, or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.

Title: Full Stack Engineer (100% remote-friendly within Spain)
Description:
How would you be impacting our mission?





As a Full Stack Engineer, you will become a valuable member of the Integrations Team within our Integrations business domain. Your responsibilities will encompass both the design and implementation of solutions, while adhering to and promoting best practices in software analysis, design, and development.





As an Integrations Team, we focus on building APIs that our partners use to integrate with our healthcare products. We also create embeddable widgets that Clinics and Doctors use to boost their efficiency and experience without leaving the software of their choice. In this business domain, you will collaborate with fellow Engineers who are experts in Vue.js, Electron, .NET, and PHP.





Each team in the domain benefits from the guidance of a dedicated Product Manager and Team Leader. We employ modern product discovery techniques inspired by the works of Marty Cagan and Teresa Torres. In terms of workflow, we adopt the Shape Up methodology and empower our engineering teams with a high degree of autonomy. The current team size stands at six members.





In this role, your primary focus will be on the frontend aspects of the widgets, developed using Vue.js and our custom UI Kit. Occasionally, you may also collaborate with colleagues on PHP-related tasks during pair programming sessions to further enhance your skill set and contribute to the team's success.





Qualifications



What will help you thrive?



You have 4+ years of experience working on web applications.
You work with TypeScript and Vue.js.
You use tools like GIT, SASS, esbuild, Webpack, NPM.
You can work with PHP (Symfony) when it is needed.
You are familiar with Extreme Programming values, principles and techniques.
You feel comfortable working in a small team, owning processes, taking initiative and making decisions. We work in Shape Up!
You can communicate in English – both spoken and written - min. B2 level.
Growth mindset: nobody ticks all those boxes above, but willingness to learn is strongly valued here.

Bonus points:



You have experience working with UI Kit / Design System.
You have experience working with Docker.
You have experience with CI / CD, incremental work breakdown, feature flags and frequent deployments.
You have experience working in DevOps Culture.
You have basic knowledge of System Design and Architecture.

You’re an excellent fit for this role if:​​​​​​​



You are a person that has a constant desire to learn new things and share your knowledge with team members.
You have great attention to detail.
You are a great team player!







Additional Information



What will you get in return?





Let’s talk money



A salary adequate to your experience and skills between 44.000and 55.000EUR. The range is broad so that we can accommodate our roles for all levels of experience, but we will show you the career ladder to explain where we see your skills and impact within the company". Your salary will be, now and always, 100% transparent to you;
Flexible remuneration and benefits system via Flexoh, which includes: restaurant card, transportation card, kindergarten, and training tax savings;
Share options plan after 6 months of working with us.





True flexibility and work-life balance



Remote or hybrid work model with our hub in Barcelona;
Flexible working hours (fully flexible, as in most cases you only have to be on a couple of meetings weekly);
Summer intensive schedule during July and August (work 7 hours, finish earlier);
23 paid holidays, with exchangeable local bank holidays;
Additional paid holiday on your birthday or work anniversary (you choose what you want to celebrate).





Health comes first



Private healthcare plan with Adeslas for you and subsidized for your family (medical and dental);
Access to hundreds of gyms for a symbolic fee in partnership for you and your family with Andjoy;
Access to iFeel, a technological platform for mental wellness offering online psychological support and counseling.





Keep growing with us



20% time rule: spend 20% of your working hours on personal development related to your role and collaboration with other teams;;
Free English and Spanish classes.



Are you from abroad?



Relocation support to Spain (we handle the bureaucracy, so you don’t have to);



We promote and embrace equal opportunities in our hiring process, and also every day at work. When you apply for our roles you receive equal treatment regardless of age, disabilities, gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or parental status, race, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex, sexual orientation or any other dimension of human difference. If you require additional support in your recruitment process, we kindly encourage you to let us know. Behind those words you’re reading, there’s a person (hi!) who already helped a candidate by adapting the interviews, and now we’re lucky to have this person with us. So, even if you’ve never asked for it before, may this serve as a sign that, now, you can do so. We can only truly be equal if we adapt to each other.



“We believe all humans, in all their beautiful diversity, should have equal rights, dignity and respect. Period.” Mariusz Gralewski, CEO

Title: Senior Python Developer - International company - Healthcare
Description:
Senior Python Developer - International Company - Healthcare




Senior Python Developer - International company - Healthcare SaaS|International SaaS company specialized in Medical Devices and Digital Healthcare




About Our Client




Our client is an international company which has created a disruptive SaaS for the Health-care and Medical devices Sector.




Their SaaS product is based on Python with Django framework. They are working with Microservices Architecture, all hosted in GCP and with also AI components that make this product uniq in the sector.




They have different nationalities in their team and English is mandatory. Their culture is really flexible and they are currently working on a hybrid modality with 4 days of home office (of course you can come when you want).




Job Description




Design and implement new functionalities and architectures using Python and Django.
Design and implement solution architecture to meet functional and non-functional requirements.
Translate business requirements into technical deliverables.
Develop additional features on existing applications.
Modeling, designing, coding, testing automation, scripting, packaging
The Successful Applicant




Highly proficient with Python programming language.
Strong experience with Python frameworks, mostly Django, but if not we also value really positive experiences with Fast Api or Flask.
Proficient with, SQL/NoSQL databases and REST/SOAP webservices.
Experience or an interest in microservices / cloud environments (Docker, Kubernetes, GCP)
Fluent English.
What's on Offer




4 days of remote work per week.
Flexible Schedule.
Free health insurance.
Salary Budget: 40K-55K depending always on the experience.
Contact: Pierre Rivenc




Quote job ref: JN-032023-5992742




Show more Show less

Title: Data Engineer for Machine Learning
Description:
Si tienes habilidades y motivación en Data Engineering para machine learning, podrías ser la persona que estamos buscando para unirte a nuestro equipo. Con sede en Barcelona, serás responsable de diseñar, construir y mantener la infraestructura de datos de la empresa.

Desempeñarás un papel crítico en garantizar la precisión, confiabilidad y escalabilidad de nuestros sistemas de datos para el aprendizaje automático.




Responsabilidades

Diseñar, construir y mantener pipelines de datos para el procesamiento de datos a gran escala y el aprendizaje automático.
Implementar soluciones de almacenamiento de datos, como data warehousing, data lakes y bases de datos.
Desarrollar e implementar controles de calidad de datos para garantizar la precisión y completitud de los datos.
Colaborar con nuestros Machine Learning Engineers, Data Scientists y partes interesadas en el negocio para entender sus necesidades de datos y traducirlas en requisitos técnicos.
Realizar modelado de datos y diseño de arquitectura de datos.
Monitorear y optimizar el rendimiento del procesamiento de datos.
Mantenerse actualizado/a con las últimas tendencias y tecnologías de la industria en ingeniería de datos.




Conocimientos deseados

Experiencia con Scrum, GIT y herramientas de CI/CD
Experiencia con herramientas de orquestación de tareas como Airflow o Luigi
Excelentes habilidades de comunicación escrita y verbal en inglés (B2/C1) y español
Conocimientos de aprendizaje automático y visión por computador




Requisitos

2+ años de experiencia como ingeniero de datos.
Ingeniero Superior en Informática, Telecomunicaciones o similar.
Excelente dominio de lenguajes de programación como Python, C++, C# o SQL
Experiencia con tecnologías de data warehousing como BigQuery, Snowflake o Redshift
Experiencia con Google Cloud Platform, AWS o Azure
Fuerte comprensión de la modelización de datos, la arquitectura de datos, ETL y ELT y el procesamiento de datos




Tecnologías IMPRESCINDIBLES

Google Cloud - GCP - Google Cloud Platform
AWS
Python
SQL




Beneficios

Contrato indefinido
Jornada completa
Un salario competitivo.
Un ambiente de trabajo dinámico y de colaboración.
Oportunidad de carrera desafiante y gratificante.
Desarrollo personal y profesional en una empresa líder en inteligencia artificial.
Trabajo a tiempo completo con horarios de trabajo flexibles.
Días disponibles para trabajar desde casa.




Perfil deseado

Espíritu emprendedor, disposición para tomar riesgos y deseo de innovar y pensar fuera de lo convencional
Excelentes habilidades para resolver problemas y pensamiento crítico
Motivado y proactivo, con pasión por aprender y la determinación de mejorar continuamente tus habilidades.
Flexible y capaz de prosperar en un entorno en constante cambio
Excelentes habilidades de comunicación y colaboración

HTML:
Si tienes habilidades y motivación en Data Engineering para machine learning, podrías ser la persona que estamos buscando para unirte a nuestro equipo. Con sede en Barcelona, serás responsable de diseñar, construir y mantener la infraestructura de datos de la empresa.

Desempeñarás un papel crítico en garantizar la precisión, confiabilidad y escalabilidad de nuestros sistemas de datos para el aprendizaje automático.


Responsabilidades

  • Diseñar, construir y mantener pipelines de datos para el procesamiento de datos a gran escala y el aprendizaje automático.
  • Implementar soluciones de almacenamiento de datos, como data warehousing, data lakes y bases de datos.
  • Desarrollar e implementar controles de calidad de datos para garantizar la precisión y completitud de los datos.
  • Colaborar con nuestros Machine Learning Engineers, Data Scientists y partes interesadas en el negocio para entender sus necesidades de datos y traducirlas en requisitos técnicos.
  • Realizar modelado de datos y diseño de arquitectura de datos.
  • Monitorear y optimizar el rendimiento del procesamiento de datos.
  • Mantenerse actualizado/a con las últimas tendencias y tecnologías de la industria en ingeniería de datos.


Conocimientos deseados

  • Experiencia con Scrum, GIT y herramientas de CI/CD
  • Experiencia con herramientas de orquestación de tareas como Airflow o Luigi
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicación escrita y verbal en inglés (B2/C1) y español
  • Conocimientos de aprendizaje automático y visión por computador


Requisitos

  • 2+ años de experiencia como ingeniero de datos.
  • Ingeniero Superior en Informática, Telecomunicaciones o similar.
  • Excelente dominio de lenguajes de programación como Python, C++, C# o SQL
  • Experiencia con tecnologías de data warehousing como BigQuery, Snowflake o Redshift
  • Experiencia con Google Cloud Platform, AWS o Azure
  • Fuerte comprensión de la modelización de datos, la arquitectura de datos, ETL y ELT y el procesamiento de datos


Tecnologías IMPRESCINDIBLES

  • Google Cloud - GCP - Google Cloud Platform
  • AWS
  • Python
  • SQL


Beneficios

  • Contrato indefinido
  • Jornada completa
  • Un salario competitivo.
  • Un ambiente de trabajo dinámico y de colaboración.
  • Oportunidad de carrera desafiante y gratificante.
  • Desarrollo personal y profesional en una empresa líder en inteligencia artificial.
  • Trabajo a tiempo completo con horarios de trabajo flexibles.
  • Días disponibles para trabajar desde casa.


Perfil deseado

  • Espíritu emprendedor, disposición para tomar riesgos y deseo de innovar y pensar fuera de lo convencional
  • Excelentes habilidades para resolver problemas y pensamiento crítico
  • Motivado y proactivo, con pasión por aprender y la determinación de mejorar continuamente tus habilidades.
  • Flexible y capaz de prosperar en un entorno en constante cambio
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicación y colaboración

Title: SW Engineer (Python/C++) Nasdaq Telecom company BCN
Description:
American company with offices in USA, EU and Middle East|Opportuinty to join R&D team of highly qualified engineers




About Our Client




Our client is an American company specialized in RF, telecommunications and wireless solutions for world-wide- famous companies




Job Description




Researching, designing, implementing, and managing software programs
Deploying software tools, processes, and metrics
Writing and implementing efficient code
Working closely with other developers and engineers
Testing and evaluating programs
Determining operational practicality
Provide comprehensive support to internal customers; achieve resolution to outstanding problems, or issues
The Successful Applicant




BS in Computer Science with 2 or more years of experience
MS in Computer Science
Excellent Python or C++ programming capabilities
Well versed in Object Oriented Design (OOD), programming and design patterns
Experience in SCRUM (Agile) development process
Extensive experience in the full life cycle of the software design process including requirement analysis, design, prototyping, coding, documentation, implementation, and maintenance
Strong Version control skills (GIT, Perforce)
Strong familiarity with the use of IDEs
Excellent debugging and problem-solving skills
Strong understanding of algorithms and data-structure.
Self-motivated, independent, proactive, detail oriented, and responsible team-player
Excellent analytical skills
Comfortable working in a dynamic and fast paced environment
Passion for innovation and emerging technologies
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Able to handle multiple priorities
Proficient in English
What's on Offer




Flexible working hours
Real possibilities to grow within the company.
Competitive salary range according to your expectations VS experience




Contact: Bernardo Pallares




Quote job ref: JN-032023-5994957

Title: Software Engineer, Engineering Productivity
Description:
Are you ready to join a visionary, fast growing enterprise data software company? Are you ready to be part of a unique culture of integrity and innovation? Are you passionate about cloud data technologies, data analytics, operational excellence and business strategy? Are you yearning to make an impact? If so, this opportunity at StreamSets might be the perfect fit for you.




If you are not sure that you’re 100% qualified, but feel up for the challenge - we want you to apply. We believe skills are transferable and drive goes a long way.




The Engineering Productivity team at StreamSets is tasked with promoting a quality-first engineering culture for our developers as well as for customers. As a Software Engineer, you will work with Engineering Productivity team leadership and different development teams on our next-generation of tooling and infrastructure to help bring the benefits of DataOps to our users.




Location: Barcelona (remote)




Responsibilities




Work on building testing frameworks, automation, and tooling to promote a culture of quality.
Support the development of customer-facing products that enable users to apply DataOps best practices to their use cases.
Learn a huge number of enterprise software environments
Collaborate with Software Development teams to provide an environment that eases development and testing of their products.


Skills




Experience with coding and software development, preferably with Python 3
Experience with scripting languages like bash
A passion for writing high quality code, best practices for software development and testing, and continuous learning
The ability to learn new technologies
Be able to multitask, and leverage your regular work with helping your teammates and colleagues that require assistance
Basic knowledge of Docker
Nice to have: Experience with pytest or Jenkins.


Experience




A BS/BA degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience+
Experience with cloud-native technologies (AWS, GCP, Azure)
3+ years professional experience as a software engineer


‣ Health insurance (mutua)




‣ The best equipment and resources - we want you to have what you need to be successful




‣ Healthy work/life balance




‣ Attractive compensation




‣ Professional development - we are invested in you




‣ Transportation allowance, food allowance, gym-health allowance, internet allowance




Our ethos




StreamSets is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. Candidates seeking employment at StreamSets are considered without regards to age, ancestry, color, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, mental or physical disability, national origin, protected family care or medical leave status, race, religion (including beliefs and practices or the absence thereof), sexual orientation, military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.




Come be a part of our diverse, dynamic team!

Title: Frontend Developer
Description:
PROYECTO





Nuestro cliente es una empresa pionera en el uso de satélites de observación de la Tierra para hacer frente a la emergencia climática. Desarrolla servicios para estudiar el estado de los recursos de la Tierra y proporcionar datos clave para las medidas de adaptación y mitigación frente a la crisis climática.







THE ROLE





Buscamos a un Desarrollador Frontend para reforzar el equipo de productos en Barcelona.





Entre tus tareas destacan:





-Co-diseñar, desarrollar, desplegar y mantener diferentes sitios web basados en React gestionados por la empresa.





-Contribuir al desarrollo de la interfaz de usuario de nuestras aplicaciones web de visualización de datos. Esto suele implicar trabajar con motores de mapeo y librerías, así como integrar datos de diferentes APIs.





-Recopilación y perfeccionamiento de especificaciones y requisitos técnicos en función de las necesidades de cada proyecto, en colaboración con el equipo comercial y técnico.





-Configuración de la recopilación de eventos de usuario para comprender el uso de los servicios desplegados.





-Configuración de las aplicaciones web para su despliegue tanto en entornos de ensayo como de producción, y mantenimiento de la documentación interna actualizada con estas configuraciones.





-Colaboración con diseñadores gráficos para hacer realidad la intención del diseño visual, explorando también las tecnologías emergentes y las tendencias del sector e integrándolas en las actividades de la empresa.







REQUISITOS





- Más de 2 años de experiencia en Javascript y React.





- Visualización de datos mediante Canvas y SVG.





- Experiencia en Next.js.





- Grado en Ingeniería informática o de telecomunicaciones.







QUÉ OFRECEN





- Contrato indefinido.





- Modalidad híbrida.





- Horario flexible.





- Buen ambiente laboral y trato muy personalizado.





- La oportunidad única de trabajar en la vanguardia de un movimiento social y económico para concienciar sobre el cambio climático y utilizar conocimientos basados en pruebas para hacerle frente de manera eficaz.

Show more Show less

Title: Principal Data Scientist
Description:
Amazing opportunity to join a crew of analytical mind. Get a chance to take part lead the development of features of AI product.



Client Details



Develop digital AI products that are easy to integrate. Believe in challenging the status quo and empowering business with meaningful AI.



Description



· Project lead of multiple initiatives (laboratories and product features)



· Define data science modeling strategy and advise/revise coding approach



· Lead of multidisciplinary teams of data scientists and developers



· Define team priorities



· Lead daily stand-up meetings of your team and sprint planning sessions



· Manage team capacity and agree project scopes



· Ultimate responsible and QA of features and deliverables



· Resolve conflicts across the functions of the team (DevOps/AI/DB/FE/BE…)



· Interact with our clients and understand their challenges, their data, and their needs



Profile



· >6 years of experience in data science



· >6 years experience with data programming/ scripting languages (Python, R, SQL). Including package building, object-oriented programming. Bonus: APIs, AWS Lambda, Step functions, …



· >6 years experience in machine-learning methodologies (supervised /unsupervised, deep learning)



· Experience leading multiple projects and multiple teams



· Experience in project planning



· Experience in communicating technically, at a level appropriate for the audience



· Ability to work in a fast pace and learn quickly



· Background in data science consulting or in product development



· (Bonus) Master in Data Science /Machine Learning



· (Bonus) AWS Cloud experience



· (Bonus) Database design/data lead



Job Offer



· Internationally diverse team.



· We develop high-quality software and thus create sustainable added value for our customers



· We live a feedback culture so that we can constantly reflect and improve



· Flexible remote work.



· We enjoy new technologies and love to learn new things and grow with them



· We give freedom for further training because lifelong learning is important to us

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Ocado Technology is building the next-generation grocery ecommerce suite that´s changing the way the world shops.







At Ocado Technology, we're an ambitious global company completely transforming the way the world shops with our cutting-edge AI, ML and robotic technology. With our retail partners spanning the globe, there's a huge amount of growth and opportunity.



The e-commerce stream plays a key role in offering frictionless, convenient, and hyper-personalised shopping experiences for millions of global users across multiple platforms, in different regions, languages, currencies, and more.



Based in our Barcelona office in the heart of the 22@ hub, this amazing community of 27+ nationalities offers an unparalleled culture focused on growth and learning.



As a Data Scientist your job purpose is to create end-to-end Data Science and Machine Learning pipelines to improve customer experience and business outcomes. Data Science is responsible for designing machine learning and optimisation techniques to convert data into value for customers and retailers in the form of new features. We work on product recommendations, search optimisation and other features to personalise the customer experience.



Our data is stored in Google BigQuery, we work in Python and SQL to define our ML pipelines and use an in-house orchestration tool, similar to Airflow.



We are looking for someone with experience in developing and optimising data science products from ideation to production with a strong bias towards MVP and iteration. You will work with the team lead, management, other data scientists, and software engineering teams to identify, plan, and manage projects.



Communication is a vital aspect of the job, as you will be in constant contact with business stakeholders and must effectively communicate complex technical issues and findings to a range of technical and non-technical internal audiences.

You will be given autonomy in how you approach complex problems and will be encouraged to research and seek out innovative solutions. On the technical side, this work includes:



setting up and supporting data pipelines
experimenting with features, parameters and models
testing and monitoring
product discovery and data analysis
other research topics

10% of your time you are free to spend on anything, as long as it's business related.



Most of your time you will spend on the other responsibilities outlined above.



Knowledge, Skills and Experience



Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, or other quantitative sciences.



Experience building productionised machine learning models at scale with a preference for MVP and iteration.



Demonstrated computer programming ability including fluency in SQL and Python (or another object oriented language).



Experience conducting research and analysis on large data sets and providing rigorous interpretations of the results.



The ability to model complex problems mathematically and/or computationally.



A solid understanding of key statistical concepts.



Desirable competencies



Portfolio of past work (applications, analysis, visualisations, blog posts, presentations etc.)



Successfully conducted research of significant scope - a Master degree or Ph.D. will be looked on favourably.



Experience working on recommendation systems.



Experience with Google Cloud Platform.



Knowledge of common machine learning toolkits (e.g. scikit-learn).



Knowledge of deep learning frameworks (e.g. TensorFlow, Theano, Torch..).

Title: GNSS Engineer for SOUTHPAN project
Description:
We lead missions to outer planets, observe the Earth from space, bring technology to Mars, integrate aerospace technology into people's daily lives... We dreamed about touching the stars, and we did it! If you don't know us yet, we are an engineering and technological innovation company working on several areas, including the space sector, where we lead projects in flight segment activities, satellite navigation, ground segment, data processing or space robotics among many others.




You will be part of our team, full of talent and desire to innovate, where you will:




Definition of new subsystems to be developed, including navigation algorithms
Maintenances of current subsystems already under operations analysising anomalies reported by the customer
Experimentation and testing
Documentation and customer support
Attedance to meetings with customer
Participation on RDI projects related to SBAS and A-RAIM systems




DO YOU WANT TO BE PART OF OUR TEAM?




If you want this position to be yours, we would like you to have the following knowledge/experience:




Software design and development
Algorithm development
Fluent in English (C1 or higher)
Programming in C
Linux (Unix) environment
Matlab/Octave
GNSS knowledge




WHAT DO WE OFFER?




Join our team and culture GMV by entering into technological and innovative projects within multicultural and multidisciplinary teams.
Professional career development and training plan. You will be able to acquire or perfect knowledge in the technologies we use as well as in skills. We also offer a language learning program.
We are flexible! We have flexible hours and intensive working hours during the summer months. In addition, you can work from home to improve your work-life balance.
We care about your well-being. You will have private health insurance with dental and accident insurance.
You will be able to make part of your salary more flexible through our flexible salary plan where you will have several options such as restaurant tickets, childcare tickets, medical insurance for a family member.…
Join our team activities, events and sports competitions. In addition, we offer Gympass to keep you active.
No dress code! Be comfortable at work
Are you coming from another country? We offer you a relocation package.
Do you want to switch off? You will find fruit and coffee at your disposal in our dining rooms.




WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?




If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact Anna Alejo Guilarte, in charge of this vacancy.




Anna Alejo Guilarte

Anna Alejo Guilarte

Title: Data Requirements Engineer
Description:
Job description:



We are looking for a new colleague in the Global Product Data Team of ZF Aftermarket at our location in Barcelona.



 



Your tasks:



Coordination & development of the global master data organization
Driving improvements by developing innovative product data concepts & end to end processes
Develop & extend the data strategy by planning, driving alignments & coordination of global master data activities
Ensure that department initiatives comply to overarching strategy targets & track activities
Development of frameworks for the product data creation on the one hand, and for providing information and data handling on the other

 





Profile description:



Your profile:



Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Engineering or a comparable qualification
Team player & problem-solving mentality
Practical experience of Organizational and Process management
Very good knowledge of MS Office and SAP R3, Power BI advantageous
Excellent English communication skills, further foreign language skills are advantageous

Title: MLOps Engineer
Description:
Sony AI are seeking a proven MLOps Engineer to join our newest team in Barcelona and work with our Gastronomy Flagship Project team.




You should be someone who has worked closely with innovation in the AI space, with experience building ML models, CD/CI, data engineering, and close partnering with research scientists to transition prototypes into quality production code. You should enjoy exploring the forefront of what is technologically possible, thrive in the face of the uncertainty and the experimental nature of working in a research environment, and find purpose in translating between novel research ideas and professional engineering standards and practices.




We offer the opportunity to join a responsible AI lab, where your manager will support you to make an impact and be recognised for your work. You’ll enjoy working with a diverse and international team in a flexible setting recognizing different personalities and lifestyles.




Find out more: https://ai.sony/projects/gastronomy/, and if you’re ready to take on the challenge with us, we want to hear from you.




You will:




Transition research prototypes to production-quality features, improving scalability, robustness, and performance along the way.
Incorporate open-source tools, automation, and cloud resources to speed up development and deployment.
Work with platform engineering to implement continuous integration and delivery to our ML cloud platform to limit manual testing and troubleshooting.
Guide and mentor research scientists regarding good engineering practices, serve as torchbearer for a modern and inclusive engineering culture.
Closely collaborate with colleagues in Spain, US, Japan, and Switzerland.
Travel to other Sony sites and international conferences.




You will bring:




Bachelor’s degree in engineering or computer science.
Plus: Master’s degree in engineering or computer science.
Three years of post-degree or equivalent engineering experience in a similar role.
Experience with building and deploying machine learning models.
Strong plus: Experience with building and deploying data pipeline infrastructure for data storage, management, and processing (particularly for text data).
Strong Python skills.
Experience working with cloud services (like AWS and GCP) and with container technologies (like Kubernetes and Docker).
Plus: Experience with automation technologies (like Ansible and Terraform).
Strong plus: Experience working with research scientists.
Plus: Experience with the supervision of interns and/or junior engineers.




Key attributes:




The ability and the willingness to work with research scientists in an ambitious research project with several unknowns, developing mutual understanding and a joint culture.
The ability to deliver on tight deadlines and adapt to evolving or changing requirements.
The ability and the willingness to work as a member of a distributed team spanning several time zones and bringing together people from diverse cultural and personal backgrounds.
Excellent written and oral communication skills in English, as well as interpersonal skills including the ability to articulate to both technical and non-technical audiences
Plus: Japanese language skills.




Your new office




In our Barcelona office you can enjoy a modern and open working environment with unbeatable views of the city. Located in Avenida Diagonal, in an energy efficient building, it is very convenient to reach the office by public transport. You can enjoy your lunch or coffee in our office kitchen, on the terrace next to the lobby, or you can walk to one of the many restaurants and shopping centres nearby.




Life at Sony




We ensure competitive salaries and benefits by using established benchmarking. We encourage healthy work-life balance supported by hybrid and flexible working policies. We are a positive community who dream big together, respect each other, and enjoy a collaborative culture.




We like to celebrate our colleagues who make a real difference using our recognition platform. We also provide access to numerous services and platforms for all aspects of wellbeing. We listen to our people through conversations and surveys, respect their suggestions, then act on them. We also provide allowances for volunteering days so that our staff can support the causes they are most passionate about.




You can build your career around you with our fantastic range of learning & personal development programs to enhance your skills. We also encourage our staff to try exciting new roles, in a wide range of countries, with a supportive mobility team to support you if you take that leap!




Bring your uniqueness to Sony




We are passionate about creating a culture that promotes equity and cultivates inclusion, diversity, and belonging. We want employees with diverse backgrounds and perspectives that will stimulate innovation and have a direct impact on our creation of social value to fulfil Sony’s purpose – ‘to fill the world with emotion, through the power of creativity and technology’. We want you to bring your unique self to work and help shape our culture.




We are Sony Europe.




Our people collaborate in an environment of respect, integrity, and open-mindedness. Diverse teams from all over Europe are the driving force for our business, and we embrace the differences that make each of us original and unique.




With offices in 28 European countries, Sony Europe caters to consumer, professional, semiconductor and healthcare markets with innovative electronics products and solutions. Our European laboratories research and develop new technologies and capabilities that contributes to the Sony Group and important issues on a planetary scale.




Bring your passion, creativity and ambitions to Sony Europe. Apply now, and let’s create the future together.




Show more Show less

Title: AI Programmer
Description:
IO Interactive is currently looking for a skilled AI Programmer to join Project 007, a brand-new James Bond video game to be developed and published by IOI. Featuring a wholly original Bond story, players will step into the shoes of the world's favourite Secret Agent to earn their 00 status in the very first James Bond origin story.



You will be part of the team implementing our very own cutting-edge AI tech. Few AAA companies rely on their own AI technology, but at IO Interactive we have created a brand-new AI framework ready to be implemented across multiple projects. We have our own AI team and we want to grow it.



 



What you will do:



You will work closely with game designers, level designers, and animation programmers not just to make the game come alive on the screens, but to make our games become a fun AAA experience.
You will take part in the design and implementation of our new AI system.
You will develop additional features and bug-fixes for AI running in our current AI system.
The AI team is part of the gameplay team, so you will collaborate with core gameplay and animation programmers. Over time, there will be excellent possibilities for taking different roles.

 



Who you are:



Experienced with AI programming from games, preferably AAA. Knowledge of implementing AI behaviour.
Excellent C++ skills.
Excellent written and verbal communications skills in English.
Open-minded and willing to accept and provide feedback to ensure the highest quality for our systems and gameplay features.

 



Who we are:



IO Interactive is an independent videogame development and publishing company with studios in Copenhagen, Malmö and Barcelona. As the creative force behind some of the most talked-about multiplatform video games in the last decade, we are committed to creating unforgettable characters and experiences – all powered by our award-winning, proprietary Glacier technology.



We know that to achieve those goals, we need courage, talented people and a great working environment – and we do our utmost to have all of that. Across our multiple studios, we’re working on several projects. Crucially though, we’re all one team. We value the work and impact that each person brings to the table and we actively encourage new ideas, whilst listening to your insights along the way.



We have a dedicated team of People Managers, who look after you as an individual and as an employee. With more than 40 nationalities, we know that everyone is different and we are proud to have a reputation for being a friendly workplace with highly-talent people.




Show more Show less

Title: Python Developer (FW)
Place: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Catalonia, Spain
Description:
¿Te interesa trabajar como Python Developer dentro de un entorno internacional?

En BETWEEN apostamos por ofrecerte las mejores oportunidades dentro del área tecnológica. Contamos con un equipo de más de 800 profesionales. Ser parte de nuestro equipo significa formar parte de una comunidad multicultural, con acceso a oportunidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional, generando impacto.

Si quieres desarrollar tus capacidades en un entorno internacional, apostando por trabajar en soluciones de I+D tanto en Ingeniería como en IT, ¡este es tu próximo destino!

Damos soporte en una gran variedad de áreas como Operaciones, Desarrollo de producto, Compras, Firmware, Software, Business Intelligence, Gestión, Transformación digital, ¡y muchas más! Además, desarrollamos soluciones tecnológicas a medida desde nuestros Hubs Tecnológicos.

La persona seleccionada trabajará con los datos de campo y posteriormente implementará correcciones en el FW de la maquina con Python, según el análisis previo de los datos.

¿Qué haré? Estas serán tus funciones principales:

Extracción y análisis los datos de campo proporcionados por las maquinas industriales con las cuales se trabaja.
Implementación de correcciones en el FW de la maquina teniendo en cuenta el análisis de datos mediante Python.


¿Cómo lo haré?

Tendrás horario flexible
Te integrarás en un equipo de alto rendimiento y con un alto grado de especialización.
Podrás trabajar en remoto o en modelo híbrido.
Tendrás un PC y los periféricos necesarios para el desarrollo de tu trabajo.
Podrás trabajar desde casa de cliente, nuestras oficinas de Barcelona en el 22@, los Hubs Tecnológicos o en el resto de las oficinas.
Trabajarás en un entorno internacional.


Si eres BETWEENER obtendrás estos beneficios:

Seguro médico con Sanitas.
Dispondrás de oportunidades de formación y desarrollo profesional: Idiomas, cursos en Udemy, Certificaciones, Programa The Power Business School y Bootcamps especializados (Agile, DevOps, IA & Big Data, Ciberseguridad, etc.).
Contarás con un equipo de Talento que te acompañará durante toda tu experiencia con nosotros. ¡Haremos un café una vez al mes! Así, mantendremos el contacto.
Pondremos a tu disposición un amplio abanico de retos y proyectos acordes con tus objetivos personales y profesionales.
Posibilidad de elegir cómo obtener parte de tu salario gracias a las ventajas fiscales de nuestra Retribución Flexible (Ticket restaurant, Ticket transporte, Ticket guardería).
Descuentos para acceder a centros de Fitness con Gympass.
Acceso a nuestro Club de Descuentos: Inspiring Benefits.
En BETWEEN nos gusta mucho hacer networking, por lo que te invitaremos a participar en todos estos eventos ¡y más!: las BETWEEN Nights, torneos deportivos, Black Mamba Race, viernes de vermut, juegos de mesa, etc.
Podrás disfrutar de nuestras fantásticas oficinas del 22@ las cuales disponen de Rooftop, tirador de cerveza, mesa de ping-pong y futbolín.
Programa de recomendación remunerado de Talento.
En BETWEEN, la igualdad de oportunidades es uno de nuestros valores. Nuestro compromiso es contratar al mejor talento independientemente de su raza, religión, sexo, edad y personas con otras capacidades y promover su desarrollo profesional y personal.


Requisitos:

Ingeniería informática, industrial o similares.
Experiencia de mínimo 2 años en programación.
Experiencia amplia con Python.
Inglés avanzado.
Muy valorable conocimientos de C++.

  • Muy valorable conocimientos de C++.

Title: Frontend Developer
Description:
Grupo Norconsulting is looking for a Front-End Developer for a huge startup company based in Barcelona to be involved in innovative and challenging projects, working in dynamic products.

To join the client directly in their offices in Barcelona and be a part of their consolidated team of developers.

Requirements

Experience in Front-End Development
Good knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3
Beginner experience of Vue JS, and advanced experienced in jQuery and Bootstrap
Understanding and experience on crossbrowsing & responsive design
Able to communicate technical issues with non-technical users
Ability to multi-task and manage tasks with varying priorities
Knowledge of git
Good knowledge of the use of APIs.

Nice to have

Demonstrated experience in JavaScript & Vue JS
Experience with version control tools and continuous integration
Knowledge of agile methodologies
Being a “problem solver”, positive attitude and ability to work in a team

Responsibilities

Programming and documentation of JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
Refactoring and maintenance of established front-end applications
Cooperation with other back-end / front-end developers to implement new product functionalities
Resolve and articulate complex problems through the UI / UX and the development of the front-end
Follow the patterns, practices and methods established in the existing code
Daily scrum and sprint plannings every 2-3 weeks
Communication with external web services
Show more Show less

Title: QA Engineer
Description:
¿Tienes ganas de asumir nuevos retos? ¿te interesa escuchar nuevas oportunidades?




En área de pharma buscamos un perfil de QA Engineer para trabajar 100% en inglés, con amplios conocimientos en Selenium y/o Cypress, y en lenguajes de programación como JAVA. La persona que se incorpore tendrá la posibilidad de trabajar en remoto. Formará parte de un proyecto innovador y puntero a nivel tecnológico.




¿Que ofrecemos?




Contrato indefinido.
Paquete con numerosos beneficios sociales.
Plan de carrera real y adaptado a tu rol.
Un buen clima laboral




Your Role




Las funciones principales para realizar serán las siguientes:




Participar en la estimación de requerimientos de generación de Testing.
Diseño y ejecución de pruebas manuales.
Participar en la estimación del requisito de pruebas de regresión.
Verificar los requisitos antes de que finalice la iteración.
Crear pruebas de regresión automáticas para requisitos nuevos y anteriores.
Desarrollar los cambios necesarios para adaptar la solución actual al nuevo enfoque de prueba
Actualizar la herramienta de informes de pruebas con los resultados de la validación.




Your Profile




Imprescindible tener entre 3 y 5 años de experiencia en:




Test Analysis, Unit tests, integration test, systems test E2E tests, UI Testing.
Experiencia en lenguajes de programación (Java, Javascript, Typescript, etc)
Selenium, Cucumber, Cypress, JUnit, Serenity, Selenide, Jest, Mocha, Mockito, Postman, SonarQube, GIT.
Integración continua con Jenkins
Docker with kubernetes
Excelente nivel de inglés




Nuestro compromiso con la inclusión e igualdad de oportunidades hace que tengamos un Plan de Igualdad y un Código Ético que garantizan el desarrollo profesional de la plantilla y la igualdad de oportunidades en su selección dentro de un entorno libre de discriminación por cuestión de etnia, nacionalidad, origen social, edad, orientación sexual, expresión de género, religión o cualquier otra circunstancia personal, física o social.




Si es así, no lo dudes e ¡INSCRIBETE!

¿Tienes ganas de asumir nuevos retos? ¿te interesa escuchar nuevas oportunidades?


En área de pharma buscamos un perfil de QA Engineer para trabajar 100% en inglés, con amplios conocimientos en Selenium y/o Cypress, y en lenguajes de programación como JAVA. La persona que se incorpore tendrá la posibilidad de trabajar en remoto. Formará parte de un proyecto innovador y puntero a nivel tecnológico.


¿Que ofrecemos?


  • Contrato indefinido.
  • Paquete con numerosos beneficios sociales.
  • Plan de carrera real y adaptado a tu rol.
  • Un buen clima laboral


Your Role


Las funciones principales para realizar serán las siguientes:


  • Participar en la estimación de requerimientos de generación de Testing.
  • Diseño y ejecución de pruebas manuales.
  • Participar en la estimación del requisito de pruebas de regresión.
  • Verificar los requisitos antes de que finalice la iteración.
  • Crear pruebas de regresión automáticas para requisitos nuevos y anteriores.
  • Desarrollar los cambios necesarios para adaptar la solución actual al nuevo enfoque de prueba
  • Actualizar la herramienta de informes de pruebas con los resultados de la validación.


Your Profile


Imprescindible tener entre 3 y 5 años de experiencia en:


  • Test Analysis, Unit tests, integration test, systems test E2E tests, UI Testing.
  • Experiencia en lenguajes de programación (Java, Javascript, Typescript, etc)
  • Selenium, Cucumber, Cypress, JUnit, Serenity, Selenide, Jest, Mocha, Mockito, Postman, SonarQube, GIT.
  • Integración continua con Jenkins
  • Docker with kubernetes
  • Excelente nivel de inglés


Nuestro compromiso con la inclusión e igualdad de oportunidades hace que tengamos un Plan de Igualdad y un Código Ético que garantizan el desarrollo profesional de la plantilla y la igualdad de oportunidades en su selección dentro de un entorno libre de discriminación por cuestión de etnia, nacionalidad, origen social, edad, orientación sexual, expresión de género, religión o cualquier otra circunstancia personal, física o social.


Si es así, no lo dudes e ¡INSCRIBETE!

Title: Senior Risk Decision Scientist (They/She/He)
Description:
About Glovo

We’re a Barcelona-based startup and the fastest-growing delivery player in Europe, Africa, and Western Asia. With food at the core of the business, Glovo delivers any product within your city at any time of day.

At Glovo, you’ll have the job of your life while working together towards our shared vision to give everyone easy access to anything in their city. We welcome top performers that will bring new ideas, diverse perspectives, and provide you the opportunities and freedom to grow and make a real impact on millions of lives… all while having fun!

We believe that diversity adds incredible value to our teams, our products, and our culture. We know that the best ideas and solutions come by bringing together people from all over the world and by fostering a culture of inclusion where everyone feels heard and has the chance to make a real impact. It's because of this that we are committed to providing equal opportunities to talent from all backgrounds.

In your application, please feel free to note which pronouns you use (For example: she/her/hers, he/him/his, they/them/theirs, etc).

Your Work-life Opportunity

Glovo is building the future of cities by enabling anyone to get any product from any store in their city delivered in minutes. Our goal is to provide on-demand delivery infrastructure for every city in the world.

In order for us to do this in a reliable fashion, we are looking for a talented Senior Risk Decision Scientist to join our team. This is a great opportunity to join our rapidly growing Fintech & Risk team within Glovo. We are constantly developing new techniques to detect and counter fraudulent and malicious actors who are constantly developing new techniques to abuse our platform. You’ll be working alongside our engineering and product team to constantly drive us to innovate while we shape the vision for the team.

Be a Part Of a Team Where You Will
Manage, mentor and develop 4 Risk Decision Scientists.
Investigate, analyze, and understand fraud & credit losses using statistical tools and on-the-ground research.
Assist in developing real-time decisioning and automated fraud detection strategies.
Propose solutions to minimize the risk of fraud and manage fraud detection tools, while creating rules and analyzing fraud patterns.
Implement experimentations (e.g. A/B test) to mitigate fraud loss rate and customer experience.
Help improve Machine Learning models accuracy and efficiency.
Chargeback and cash management: Review and defend customer payment disputes (fraudulent and non-fraudulent ones).
Understand business needs and create insightful analysis to enable the leadership teams to answer their needs. Write queries and perform ad hoc data analysis to keep the nerve centre of our operations engine running at full speed.

You Have

3-5 years of experience in a similar role with 2 years of management experience.
BS/BA or higher degree in a quantitative field, computer science, engineering or extensive experience in operations management.
Outstanding English speaking and writing skills (internal work language).
Experience in SQL with the ability to analyze large quantities of data using statistical analysis tools such as Python, and working with modern BI tools like Tableau or Looker.
Experience in identifying gaps in business strategy, with a focus on fraud.
Creative problem solving and critical thinking skills with a bias toward action and a get things done attitude.
Ability to build relationships with key stakeholders across the teams.

We are always looking for the best candidates, so if you think you would be a good fit even if you don't meet 100% of the requirements we would love to hear from you!

Experience Our Glovo Life Benefits

Enticing equity plan (if applicable)
Top-notch private health insurance
Monthly Glovo credit to spend on our restaurant products and zero delivery fee on all Glovo orders!
Discounted gym memberships
Flexible time off (take the time you need) and hybrid working model (own your time)
Enhanced parental leave including nursery support!
Online therapy and wellbeing benefit

What You’ll Find When Working At Glovo

Gas: Driven to deliver quality results quickly
Good Vibes: Bring positivity and communicate openly
Stay Humble: Self-aware and open to learning
Care: Uplift people and the planet
Glownership: Act as proud owners
High Bar: Focus on Top Performance

If you believe you match these values, we look forward to meeting you!

Wanna take a peek into what it's like to work at Glovo? Follow us on Instagram and like us on Facebook!

Glovo is transforming the way consumers access local goods, enabling anyone to get almost any product delivered in minutes. Our on-demand logistics connect customers with independent local couriers who acquire goods from any restaurant or store in a city, as well as deliver urgent packages for a variable fee. For additional information on Glovo, please visit https://about.glovoapp.com/
Show more Show less

We are constantly developing new techniques to detect and counter fraudulent and malicious actors who are constantly developing new techniques to abuse our platform. You’ll be working alongside our engineering and product team to constantly drive us to innovate while we shape the vision for the team.

  • Manage, mentor and develop 4 Risk Decision Scientists.

  • Monthly Glovo credit to spend on our restaurant products and zero delivery fee on all Glovo orders!

  • Enhanced parental leave including nursery support!
  • Online therapy and wellbeing benefit

  • Gas: Driven to deliver quality results quickly
  • Good Vibes: Bring positivity and communicate openly
  • Stay Humble: Self-aware and open to learning
  • Care: Uplift people and the planet
  • Glownership: Act as proud owners
  • High Bar: Focus on Top Performance
If you believe you match these values, we look forward to meeting you!

Wanna take a peek into what it's like to work at Glovo? Follow us on Instagram and like us on Facebook!

Glovo is transforming the way consumers access local goods, enabling anyone to get almost any product delivered in minutes. Our on-demand logistics connect customers with independent local couriers who acquire goods from any restaurant or store in a city, as well as deliver urgent packages for a variable fee. For additional information on Glovo, please visit https://about.glovoapp.com/

Title: Python Developer
Company: Prometeo Talent | High-quality HR & recruitment services
Description:
Sobre la compañía 




StockAgile es un software de gestión para las marcas, fabricantes y tiendas, que tiene como objetivo simplificar y resolver todos las operaciones en una misma plataforma. Es una start-up tecnológica en pleno crecimiento con un equipo joven y con mucha ambición. Estamos ubicados en el distrito tecnológico del 22@ en Barcelona.

Nuestra misión es simplificar y automatizar la gestión de las pequeñas y medianas empresas de comercio para que puedan vender a múltiples canales y así crecer sin límites!Queremos ser la empresa líder gestionando, automatizando y optimizando las empresas de comercio. ¿Nos ayudas?




Nuestra propuesta

Buscamos un Python Developer que se sume al equipo para tomar decisiones sobre nuesro producto, actualmente somos 8 personas en el equipo. Queremos alguien que quiera aprender al lado de un equipo joven, agil y con muchas ganas de trabajar y que quiera dejar huella en el mundo del Retail y el sector SaaS.

 

Responsabilidades: 

Diseñar e implementar nuevos casos de uso de la herramienta
Diseñar y desarrollar mejoras en la aplicación web.
Hacer code review y validación de desarrollos del equipo técnico.
Resolver dudas de los desarrollos al equipo de QA 

Lo que buscamos:

Más de 2 años de experiencia desarrollando backend
Experiencia con Python
Experiencia con metodologías ágiles
Se valorará experiencia con Django, Django Rest Framework, Angular/AngularJS y con TDD
Ingles nivel intermedio

Qué ofrecemos?

La oportunidad de crecer personal y profesionalmente junto a una start-up de éxito en el sector Retail Tech y de aprender de todo este proceso con un equipo joven y TOP.
Posibilidad de crecer dentro de la empresa a corto-medio plazo
Flexibilidad horaria
Esquema híbrido - dias de WFH semanal.
Ambiente joven y dinámico
Snacks & Food: fruta fresca, bebidas, snacks, café
Open library, Workshops, Katas Dojos
Cursos de formación
Actividades de teambuilding




Proceso de Seleccion:




Se trata de un screening inicial + 1 entrevista con CTO + Prueba tecnica + Entrevista con CEO

Title: Data scientist predoctoral
Company: Fundació de Recerca Sant Joan de Déu
Description:
Desitgem incoporar Data Scientist Predoctoral per la incorporació a un projecte de caracterització clínica i cerca de dianes terapèutiques en el parkinsonisme infantil.

Funcions Principals:

Contribució al desenvolupament d'una base de dades amb informació clínica (fenotips, ultrafenotipat), escales de valoració de la simptomatologia, dades genètiques, de neuroimatge, d'EEG i dades bioquímiques (-òmiques) de pacients amb parkinsonisme pediàtric.
Anàlisi dirigit a trobar marcadors pronòstics i fisiopatològics creuant dades clíniques, genètiques, bioquímiques i òmiques.
Desenvolupament d'algoritmes: mapping entre HPOs i dades que caracteritzen la malaltia.
Estudi estadístic avançat ultilitzant metodologia "machine learning" i focalitzant-se en dades que conflueixin en vies dopaminèrgiques regulades per l'enzim tirosina hidroxilasa


Què oferim

Incorporació a un equip multidisciplinar focalitzat en el neurometabolisme format per neuropediatres, neurocientífics, bioquímics i genetistes.

Molt bon ambient de treball, companyerisme, col.laboració, molta motivació i connexions internacionals.

Requisits:

Requisits:

Formació (grau universitari/màster) en ciències relacionades amb el maneig i anàlisi de les dades
Bon nivell d'anglès parlat i escrit
Capacitat de treball en equip
